# What Is a Good Cold Email Open Rate?

URL: https://coldmailopenrate.com
Description: A good cold email open rate is 40–60%. The industry average is 44% in 2026. Below 30% signals deliverability problems or weak subject lines.

## Quick Answer

A good cold email open rate is 40–60%. The industry average is 44% in 2026. Below 30% signals deliverability problems or weak subject lines.
